scripts.test: cd worker-sandbox && NO_MINIFY=1 worker-build --dev && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx vitest run
scripts.test-http: cd worker-sandbox && NO_MINIFY=1 worker-build --dev --features http && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx vitest run
scripts.lint:fix: cargo fmt && cargo clippy --features d1,queue --all-targets --workspace --fix -- -D warnings
